center.bold: William Jarvis and Dael Doemland, Appellees, v. City of Chicago, Monroe
Loeb and Sylvester M. Alexander, d/b/a Loeb Wrecking Lumber Co., Richard

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, First District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Superior Court of Cook county; the Hon. DUANE T. LEACH, Judge, presiding. Reversed and remanded.
opinion.opinion_byline: The court adopts the opinion, written by JUDGE NIEMEYER, as the opinion of the court.

opinion_text.bold: Not to be published in full.
